question: Typhoon Vamco, which was seen in news recently, hit which country?
explanation:
Typhoon Vamco has recently hit the Philippines and caused extensive flooding. It is said to have killed around 40 people.
Vamco has followed Typhoon Goni, which is one of the strongest typhoons in the world this year. The country is hit by about 20 typhoons and tropical storms each year as it is one of the worldâ€™s most disaster-prone countries.
